001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.math.BigDecimal;
021import java.math.MathContext;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027
028public class DecimalAdapter
029    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<BigDecimal, IDecimalItem> {
030  public static final MathContext MATH_CONTEXT = MathContext.DECIMAL64;
031  @NonNull
032  private static final BigDecimal DECIMAL_BOOLEAN_TRUE = new BigDecimal("1.0");
033  @NonNull
034  private static final BigDecimal DECIMAL_BOOLEAN_FALSE = new BigDecimal("0.0");
035  @NonNull
036  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
037      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "decimal")));
038
039  DecimalAdapter() {
040    super(BigDecimal.class);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public List<QName> getNames() {
045    return NAMES;
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
050    return JsonFormatTypes.NUMBER;
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public BigDecimal parse(String value) {
055    return new BigDecimal(value, MATH_CONTEXT);
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator) throws IOException {
060    try {
061      generator.writeNumber((BigDecimal) value);
062    } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
063      throw new IOException(ex);
064    }
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public BigDecimal copy(Object obj) {
069    // a BigDecimal is immutable
070    return (BigDecimal) obj;
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public Class<IDecimalItem> getItemClass() {
075    return IDecimalItem.class;
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public IDecimalItem newItem(Object value) {
080    BigDecimal item = toValue(value);
081    return IDecimalItem.valueOf(item);
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  protected IDecimalItem castInternal(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
086    IDecimalItem retval;
087    if (item instanceof INumericItem) {
088      retval = newItem(((INumericItem) item).asDecimal());
089    } else if (item instanceof IBooleanItem) {
090      boolean value = ((IBooleanItem) item).toBoolean();
091      retval = newItem(value ? DECIMAL_BOOLEAN_TRUE : DECIMAL_BOOLEAN_FALSE);
092    } else {
093      retval = super.castInternal(item);
094    }
095    return retval;
096  }
097}
